name: 01's Blackhole Demo
description:
Jack is sucked into a blackhole after trying to look for help. Jack now has to fight and find his way back home and stop who's making the blackholes.

After a month of developing 01's Blackhole, this is the demo!

It's been fun and frustrating creating this game. I will still develop the full version, I'm having a lot of fun fleshing out the characters and story, plus I'm too far into making it to give up now.

Controller may be supported in the future, but no promises.
